verses.verse: <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G4891>ye<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> be <S%G4891>risen<s%> with <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2212>seek<s%> those things which are <S%G507>above<s%>, <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2076%G2521>sitteth<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.
Set your <S%G5426>affection<s%> on things <S%G507>above<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> on things <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>.
<S%G1063>For<s%> ye are <S%G599>dead<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> is <S%G2928>hid<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G3752>When<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, who is <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>, shall <S%G5319>appear<s%>, <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G5319>shall<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5319>appear<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>.

<S%G3499>Mortify<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>; <S%G4202>fornication<s%>, <S%G167>uncleanness<s%>, inordinate <S%G3806>affection<s%>, <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G1939>concupiscence<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4124>covetousness<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1495>idolatry<s%>:
<S%G1223>For<s%> which things' <S%G3739>sake<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G543>disobedience<s%>:
<S%G1722>In<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4043>walked<s%> some <S%G4218>time<s%>, <S%G3753>when<s%> ye <S%G2198>lived<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> put <S%G659>off<s%> all <S%G3956>these<s%>; <S%G3709>anger<s%>, <S%G2372>wrath<s%>, <S%G2549>malice<s%>, <S%G988>blasphemy<s%>, filthy <S%G148>communication<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>.
<S%G5574>Lie<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> one to <S%G1519%G240>another<s%>, seeing that ye have put <S%G554>off<s%> the <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4234>deeds<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> have put <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G3501>new<s%> man, <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G341>renewed<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the image of <S%G1504>him<s%> that <S%G2936>created<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>:

<S%G3699>Where<s%> there <S%G1762>is<s%> <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G1672>Greek<s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> <S%G2453>Jew<s%>, <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%>, <S%G915>Barbarian<s%>, <S%G4658>Scythian<s%>, <S%G1401>bond<s%> nor <S%G1658>free<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>.

Put <S%G1746>on<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G1588>elect<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G25>beloved<s%>, <S%G4698>bowels<s%> of <S%G3628>mercies<s%>, <S%G5544>kindness<s%>, humbleness of <S%G5012>mind<s%>, <S%G4236>meekness<s%>, <S%G3115>longsuffering<s%>;

<S%G430>Forbearing<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5483>forgiving<s%> one <S%G1438>another<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3437>quarrel<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%>: even <S%G2531%G2532>as<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G5483>forgave<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> do <S%G5210>ye<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1909>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> these <S%G5125>things<s%> put on <S%G26>charity<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4886>bond<s%> of <S%G5047>perfectness<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1018>let<s%> the <S%G1515>peace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1018>rule<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>, <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> ye are <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G1096>ye<s%> <S%G2170>thankful<s%>.

<S%G1774>Let<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1774>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4146>richly<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%>; <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3560>admonishing<s%> one <S%G1438>another<s%> in <S%G5568>psalms<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5215>hymns<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G5603>songs<s%>, <S%G103>singing<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3748%G3956>whatsoever<s%> ye <S%G302%G4160>do<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2228%G1722>or<s%> <S%G2041>deed<s%>, do <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, giving <S%G2168>thanks<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
<S%G1135>Wives<s%>, submit <S%G5293>yourselves<s%> unto your <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> it is <S%G433>fit<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.
<S%G435>Husbands<s%>, <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G1135>wives<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4087>be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4087>bitter<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G5043>Children<s%>, <S%G5219>obey<s%> your <S%G1118>parents<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> well <S%G2101>pleasing<s%> unto the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.
<S%G3962>Fathers<s%>, <S%G2042>provoke<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> to anger, <S%G3363>lest<s%> they be <S%G120>discouraged<s%>.

<S%G1401>Servants<s%>, <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> your <S%G2962>masters<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>; <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3787>eyeservice<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G441>menpleasers<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G572>singleness<s%> of <S%G2588>heart<s%>, <S%G5399>fearing<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3956%G3748%G1437>whatsoever<s%> ye <S%G4160>do<s%>, <S%G2038>do<s%> it <S%G1537%G5590>heartily<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> unto <S%G444>men<s%>;

<S%G1492>Knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> ye shall <S%G618>receive<s%> the <S%G469>reward<s%> of the <S%G2817>inheritance<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> ye <S%G1398>serve<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> he that doeth <S%G91>wrong<s%> shall <S%G2865>receive<s%> for the <S%G91>wrong<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he hath <S%G91>done<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> respect of <S%G4382>persons<s%>.
